channel.title: 508 / 510 client help
channel.description:
Whenever i go to use a 508/510 Client i get this message
'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .
and when i press Enter it closes i was wondering how to fix this problem and get it to run

item.title: 508 / 510 client help
item.dc:creator: @Rsps_Evolve Rsps_Evolve
item.description:
@Rsps_Evolve wrote:

You don’t use command prompt?

You use Run.bat, or Runserver

Read full topic
